lead_paragraph: Jason Pominville scored his team-leading 24th goal, and the Buffalo Sabres inched closer to clinching the Northeast Division title with a 6-2 victory over the visiting Florida Panthers.
snippet: Jason Pominville scored his team-leading 24th goal, and the Buffalo Sabres inched closer to clinching the Northeast Division title with a 6-2 victory over the visiting Florida Panthers.

headline.main: Stamkos’s 46th Goal Helps Lightning Defeat Penguins
headline.seo: Stamkos’s 46th Goal Helps Lightning Defeat Penguins
